publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Saturday December 8, 2018 at 11:13

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The Physique Collection includes assorted publications that document changes in the codes, standards, and aesthetics of the male body.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Transferred by the Larry Kramer Initiative Executive Coordinator, 2004. Transferred from the Librarian for Gay and Lesbian Studies, 2007. Transferred from the Librarian for Lesbian, Gay, Bisexual, and Transgender Studies, 2015. Gift of Bert Hansen, 2017.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Copyright status for collection materials is unknown. Transmission or reproduction of materials protected by U.S. Copyright Law (Title 17, U.S.C.) beyond that allowed by fair use requires the written permission of the copyright owners. Works not in the public domain cannot be commercially exploited without permission of the copyright owners. Responsibility for any use rests exclusively with the user.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Physique Collection (MS 1850). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is arranged alphabetically by title.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Physique Collection includes assorted publications that document changes in the codes, standards, and aesthetics of the male body.

Bear Magazine and/or influences [early issues; fragments]
Bill the Hun [letter to "patron" regarding brochure]

unittitle.title: America the Beautiful: The Official 1980 Blueboy Calendar

Can-Am Catalog and Video Reviews [gay wrestling videos]
The Best of Gallery , 2 issues including no. 2
David and his Friends , vols. 1, 3 [including David Goes Cowboy ]
Drum: Sex in Perspective , vol. 4, nos. 8, 10; vol. 5, nos. 1-2, 10-11

unittitle.title: Hard? A Pictorial and Literary Study

did.unittitle: Honcho [S/M], 13 issues including vol. 2, no. 15; vol. 4, nos. 14, 21; vol. 5, nos. 22, 24-25, 8-10; vol. 6, no. 3; vol. 7, no. 1; vol. 12, no. 1
In Touch [also known as In Touch for Men ], nos. 28, 49, 57-58, 63-64, 73
J. Brian Presents Male Pix , no. 1
The Male Figure , vols. 14, 20, 33 [Bruce of Los Angeles]

unittitle.title: Meet West. Just one of THE BIG 100!

did.unittitle: "The Motorcyclist" [writings with accompanying illustrations-probably privately circulated]
100 Numbers Presents Action Shots of the Hotline Series , vol. 1, no. 4

Rocco, Pat, catalog of male films, photos, color slides

unittitle.title: The Best of Tom of Finland
The First Tom of Finland Calendar

Torso , vol. 1, nos. 9, 12; vol. 2, nos. 2, 8; vol. 5, no. 6; vol. 7, no. 4; vol. 8, no. 8

Lger [premier collectors edition of drawings by Lger]
Mnnespielen: A Portfolio of Drawings by Rex [first publication]
100 Male Nudes: The Best of Physique Pictorial [mini-book of photographs and drawings that appeared in Physique Pictorial , a publication in existence from 1952-1993]

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This accession comprises items of promotional ephemera for Champion Studios and other Physique Magazine photography and art producers. Most of the items are order forms for different art and photographic prints.

did.unittitle: Gymn, The Magazine of Male Athletes , number 3
Male Model Parade (photographs by Lon), numbers 3, 4, 6
Male Pix (photographs by Lon), volumes 1, 2, 3, and 4
Man Alive , numbers 3, 5, and two unidentified issues
